reviewText: Is Forgotten Ball worth the money? Yes! I reviewed it in more detail in my video - https://youtu.be/E-DQY_3mzNg. It's only short but it gives a bit of gameplay, as well as the pros and cons of the game :)

reviewText:
Failed to realise this game is way too deep. Literally!
I had to take a leap of faith, which leads me to free falling for next few minutes!
Even saw some titles, music guy is cool doe!
And eventually when I landed somewhere, I wasn't able to move or jump!

Prolly, you might download the soundtrack, that's all!
But game is bad, better play C.U.B.E (pretty old, but anyway)
